        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/press/base/css/grid/grid-for-ie7.css" type="text/css"/>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/press/base/css/icons/icons-ie7.css" type="text/css"/>

    <![endif]-->

    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="/static/press/js/libraries-plugins/modernizr.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

    
    

<script type="text/javascript">

var UKCMS = UKCMS || {};

UKCMS.getAmazonVersion = function () {
    // http://docs.aws.amazon.com/silk/latest/developerguide/detecting-silk-ua.html
    var silkMatch = /(?:; ([^;)]+) Build\/.*)?\bSilk\/([0-9._-]+)\b(.*\bMobile Safari\b)?/.exec(navigator.userAgent);
}

UKCMS.getAndroidVersion = function (ua) {
    ua = (ua || navigator.userAgent).toLowerCase();
    var match = ua.match(/android\s([0-9\.]*)/);
    return match ? match[1] : false;
}

UKCMS.getiOSVersion = function (ua) {
    if (/iP(hone|od|ad)/.test(navigator.platform)) {
        // supports iOS 2.0 and later: <http://bit.ly/TJjs1V>
        var v = (navigator.appVersion).match(/OS (\d+)_(\d+)_?(\d+)?/);
        return v ? [parseInt(v[1], 10), parseInt(v[2], 10), parseInt(v[3] || 0, 10)] : false;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

UKCMS.user_status = '';
    //user_status: 'vod-ready',

UKCMS.SETTINGS = {
    days_left_threshold: 3,
    filter_api_base: '',
    is_play_portal: '',
    is_vod_watch_page: '' === '' ? false : true,
    itunes_app_url: '',
    google_play_app_url: '',
    amazon_app_url: '',
    primetime_start: parseInt('', 10),
    site: '',
    site_name: '',
    play_redirect_referrers: ''
};

UKCMS.CLIENT = {
    initialViewportWidth: $(window).width(),
    is_iPad: /iPad/i.test(navigator.userAgent),
    is_iOS: navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPad') > -1 || navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPhone') > -1 || navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPod') > -1,
    is_iOS_version: UKCMS.getiOSVersion(),
    is_android: UKCMS.getAndroidVersion() ? true : false,
    is_amazon: UKCMS.getAmazonVersion() ? true : false,
    is_android_version: UKCMS.getAndroidVersion(),
    is_ie8orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie9"),
    is_ie9orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie10"),
    is_ie10orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie11"),
    theBody: $('body'),
    viewportWidth: $(window).width()
};

UKCMS.URLS = {
    newsletter_signup: '',
    program_detail: '',
    login: '/cas/login',
    logout: '/cas/logout',
    user_profile: '',
    vod_maxi_player: '',
    play_site: ''
};

UKCMS.RANDOM_THEMES = {
    isEnabled: true,                  // Random Themes for use in 'js/random-themes.js'
    usesSameBGGradient: false,        // does each random theme bg have its own gradient too?
    excludeByBodyClass: [],           // pages to exclude from random themes, targeted by body class
    numberOfThemes: 1                 // must correspond with number of images
};

UKCMS.VOD = {};

// use the VoD maxi player if the user is on an iPad
UKCMS.VOD.use_maxi_player = UKCMS.CLIENT.is_iPad;
</script>


    <!-- IE support for media queries & CSS selectors -->

    <![endif]-->

</head>

<script src="/static/js/facebook.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script>
    facebookAppId = '172431169478101';
    facebookDefaultScope = ["email", "user_about_me", "user_birthday", "user_website"];
    staticUrl = '/static/';
    function facebookJSLoaded(){
        FB.init({appId: facebookAppId, status: false, cookie: true, xfbml: true, oauth: true});
    }
    window.fbAsyncInit = facebookJSLoaded;
    F = new facebookClass(facebookAppId);
    F.load();
</script>

            <h2 class="cas-title press">UKTV Press Office</h2>
            <p>Welcome to the UKTV Press Office – the home for all UKTV press releases, images, listings, preview videos and publicist contact details. Access to the UKTV Press Office is restricted to journalists and affiliates only.</p>
            <p>You may request access to the site by clicking <a href="/register/press/" title="Register with UKTV Press Office">register</a> above.</p>
            <p>You can access the latest <a href="http://corporate.uktv.co.uk/news/" title="View the latest UKTV New and Press releases">UKTV News and Press releases</a> without having to register.</p>
            <p class="extra-pad">For any queries please email: <a href="mailto:pressoffice@uktv.co.uk" title="">pressoffice@uktv.co.uk</a></p>

                <input max_length="255" type="email" name="email" id="id_email">

    <div id="register" class="fade tab-pane">

        <h2 class="cas-title press">UKTV Press Office</h2>
        <p>Welcome to the UKTV Press Office – the home for all UKTV press releases, images, listings, preview videos and publicist contact details.</p>
        <p>Access to the UKTV Press Office is restricted to journalists and affiliates only. You may request access to the site by submitting the form below.</p>
        <p>You can register separately if you only require access to <a href="http://pictures.uktv.co.uk" title="Visit the UKTV Pictures website">UKTV Pictures.</a></p>
        <p class="extra-pad">For any queries please email: <a href="mailto:pressoffice@uktv.co.uk" title="">pressoffice@uktv.co.uk</a></p>

            <h2 class="cas-title">Sign up here</h2>

                    <div class="widget why-register" id="why-register">
                        <h3 class="widget-title">Why register?</h3>
                        <div class="widget-bg">
                            
                                <p>Registered press affiliates can:</p>
                                <ul>
                                    <li>Watch previews of upcoming TV shows</li>
                                    <li>See advance TV listings</li>
                                    <li>Access the UKTV picture library</li>
                                    <li>Access publicist contact details</li>
                                </ul>
                                <p>Registration is not required for <a href="http://corporate.uktv.co.uk/news/" title="View the latest UKTV New and Press releases">UKTV News and Press releases</a>.</p>

<script>
    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
        (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
            m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
    })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-1623692-24', 'uktv.co.uk');
    ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>
